hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira.:Once Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) offered two rak`at and finished his prayer. So Dhul-Yadain asked him, "Has the prayer been reduced or have you forgotten?" Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Has Dhul-Yadain spoken the truth?" The people replied in the affirmative. Then Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) stood up and offered the remaining two rak`at and performed Taslim, and then said Takbir and performed two prostrations like his usual prostrations, or a bit longer, and then got up

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَتَشَهَّدْ فِي سَجْدَتَىِ السَّهْوِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever did not recite Tashah-dud (At-Tahiyyat) after the two prostrations of Sahw

hadiths.text: Narrated Salama bin 'Alqama:I asked Muhammad (bin Seereen) whether Tashah-hud should be recited after the two prostrations of Sahu. He replied, "It is not (mentioned) in Abu Huraira's narration

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَتَشَهَّدْ فِي سَجْدَتَىِ السَّهْوِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever did not recite Tashah-dud (At-Tahiyyat) after the two prostrations of Sahw
